    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le cycle de vie d'un plant de petit pois</string>
            <string language="en">The life cycle of a pea plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Lebenszyklus eines Erbse Betriebes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ciclo de vida de uma planta da ervilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ciclo di vita di una pianta dei piselli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος ζωής εγκαταστάσεων μπιζελιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciclo vital de una planta del guisante</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Quatrième sur six dans une série d'illustrations montrant les étapes de la vie d'un plan de petit pois. Montrées ici est un plant de petit pois à sa taille maximale portant des cosses.</string>
            <string language="en">Fourth in a series of six illustrations showing the life stages of a pea plant. Shown here is a full grown pea plant bearing pods.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fleurs</string>
            <string language="en">flowers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fruits</string>
            <string language="en">fruits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cycle de vie</string>
            <string language="en">life cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pois</string>
            <string language="en">pea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cosses</string>
            <string language="en">pods</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viertel in einer Reihe von sechs Abbildungen, 
welche die Lebenstadien eines Erbse Betriebes zeigen. Hier 
worden Hülsen eines gezeigt volle angebaute Erbse Betriebslagers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fourth em uma série de seis ilustrações que 
mostram os estágios da vida de uma planta da ervilha. São 
mostrados aqui os pods crescidos cheios de um rolamento da planta da 
ervilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quarto in serie di sei illustrazioni che 
mostrano le fasi di vita di una pianta dei piselli. È indicato 
qui i baccelli coltivati pieni dei piselli del cuscinetto della 
pianta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέταρτο σε μία σειρά έξι απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν
στάδια ζωής εγκαταστάσεων μπιζελιών. Εμφανισμένοι εδώ 
είναι φέροντες λοβοί οι πλήρεις αυξημένοι μπιζελιών 
εγκαταστάσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuarto en una serie de seis ilustraciones que 
muestran las etapas de la vida de una planta del guisante. Se 
muestran aquí las vainas producidas llenas del guisante de un 
cojinete de la planta.</string>
          </description>
